name: The Unholy Conspiracy
description:
This game was made for the Holistic 3d lockdown game jam in 3days(20 hours)

Based upon the Russian Sleep Experiment,this derivative work is a puzzle/escape-the-room game. As your finally awake with amnesia,you find yourself in a set of rooms laid with puzzles. You will uncover more about the Unholy conspiracy, the sleep experiment 2.0, as you progress.

Did I mention I'm 15? ;)

BUG FIX:

Fixed alighting isse in ending scene and a bug on the document in the second level,nothing major

Controls:

-wasd to move

-space to jump

-C to crouch

-Tab or Rclick for flashlight

-E or LClick to interact

Tips(if stuck):

-There is a solutions file attached if you're desperate.....

-Try to pay attention to days and dates,they will help in puzzle #9

-Use your flashlight, solutions may be hidden in the darkest of corners

- Read the hints carefully,word by word and try to get synonym meanings.Often unusually large or small words are the keywords
